property.name: Text
property.value: Each hero you control with a printed Î resource icon gets -1 threat cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control Outlands allies that belong to 4 different spheres, ready Forlong at the beginning of each phase.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed Ì resource icon.
Action: Ready each ally in play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ï hero. Limit 1 per hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, deal 1 damage to another enemy that shares a Trait with the enemy just destroyed.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play only if each hero you control has the printed Ï resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase, if the current quest has no keyword it gains battle. (Characters quest using Û instead of Ò.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a character leaves play, discard Silvan Refugee from play.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play only if each hero you control has the printed Ê resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase, Ê characters use their Ò instead of Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card effect adds any number of resources to the resource pool of a hero you control, Harbor Master gains +1 Ú until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play only if each hero you control has a printed Î resource icon.
Action: Until the end of the phase, enemies do not make engagement checks

property.name: Text
property.value: If each hero you control belongs to the same sphere of influence, you may assign damage from undefended enemy attacks to White Tower Watchman instead of a hero you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Drúadan Forest

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Drû-buri-Drû and set him aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Drúadan Forest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Reveal 1 card from the encounter deck per player and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Archery damage must be assigned to allies, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Drúadan Forest

property.name: Text
property.value:
Allies cannot defend against Drû-buri-Drû.
While Drû-buri-Drû is in the victory display, characters get +1 Ò and +1 Ú.
Unless Drû-buri-Drû is in the victory display, the players cannot win.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Drúadan Forest

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Drû-buri-Drû to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Drúadan Forest

property.name: Text
property.value:
Characters use their Ò instead of Û when attacking enemies. If an enemy would be damaged this way, place progress tokens on it instead of damage tokens. When an enemy has progress equal to its hit points, add it to the victory display and place those progress tokens on the quest.
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each hero must pay 1 resource or take 1 damage. If no hero takes damage from this effect, Men in the Dark gains surge.

property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each hero the defending player controls with no resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must pay 1 resource for each attachment he controls or discard all attachments he controls.
